oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Bill of sale for Sam, an enslaved man, in Williamson County, Tennessee, from Robert Glass to William Harrison, Jr., 1848 April 22
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A bill of sale for Sam, an enslaved Negro man, about age 23 or 24, from Robert Glass to William Harrison, Jr., of Williamson County, Tennessee, for the sum of six hundred dollars. The document was witnessed on April 22, 1848 by A.B. Ewing. Forms part of the Harrison House Collection. 1 document : b & w ; 16 x 20 cm.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Harrison, William, 1825-1889; Glass, Robert; Ewing, Andrew B.
Harrison House (Franklin, Tenn.)
